text: Elected officials should not use their position of power to trade stocks that enrich themselves and their families.My bipartisan legislation would ban Members of Congress and their families from trading stocks while in office. Itâ€™s time Congress passes this important bill.

My bill is named after Bob von Schwedler who worked at Delphi for 36 years before losing his pension and benefits. The Health Coverage Tax Credit was critical in helping Bob beat cancer. My bill will restore and increase this critical program to help more people like Bob.
